description.value: A sky crane uses massive parachutes and thrusters to transport terrestrial vehicles and mechs from a starship in orbit or the atmosphere to the ground and back again. The sky crane requires two expansion bays on its own as well as appropriate storage, such as a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.starship-components.Item.EyfdSQ38eIo6VWK4]{mech bay} (page 28), and can deploy or recover one mech or vehicle per hour.
